column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Rody - Thank you very much for the excellent review. We greatly appreciate it and the photos
column2: too. I'm very pleased to know that your server provided good service and was helpful in explaining our menu. And you are correct: If there is ever any issue with your bowl of ramen for any reason
column3: just let your server know and he or she will have it remade until it meets your complete satisfaction.
